docs.summary:
Represents the full browser screen overlay that appears when the hamburger menu is opened. 

> **Note:** The hamburger menu serves as an alternative to the traditional [Menu](https://www.wix.com/velo/reference/$w/menu) 
> to save space on smaller screen sizes. Its function is to toggle between an expanded and collapsed menu upon user interaction.
description: The hamburger overlay is a visual component, which appears as a dark layer beneath the
hamburger menu container. The overlay is activated when the hamburger menu container is opened.
